sourcesContent: import img from '../../image/me.jpeg' import SocialMedia from '../icons /SocialMedia' import { useState } from 'react' import { TopItems, TopWrapper, Image, SearchIcon, TopList, Items, } from './TopBar.styled' import { NavLink, Outlet, Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Topbar = () => { const [activeRegister, setActiveRegister] = useState('Login') const [activeSearch, setActiveSearch] = useState(true) const activeStyle = { textDecoration: 'underline', color: 'black', } const navLink = ({ isActive }) => (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined) const registerLink = () => { setActiveRegister('Register') } return ( <> Home Write Your Story {activeRegister === 'Login' && 'Login'} {activeRegister === 'Register' && 'Register'} ) } export default Topbar
